/* DFS */
#include<stdio.h>
#include<vector>
using namespace std;

int k;
int degree[100001];
int removed[100001];
vector<int> adj[100001];
 
void DFS(int node)
{
   removed[node] = 1;
   for(int i=0; i<adj[node].size(); i++)
   {
       int next = adj[node][i];
       degree[next]--;  //either here to decrease the removed element's count from all the elements list 
                        //or, inside if below to remove from non- removed elements only
       if( (!removed[next]) && degree[next]<k)  DFS(next);
   }
}
 
 
int main()
{
    int n,m,a,b,count=0;
    scanf("%d%d%d",&n,&m,&k);
    for(int i=0; i<m; i++)
    {
        scanf("%d%d",&a,&b);
        adj[a].push_back(b), degree[a]++;
        adj[b].push_back(a), degree[b]++;
    }
    
    for(int i=0; i<n; i++)  if( (!removed[i]) && degree[i]<k )  DFS(i);
    
    for(int i=0; i<n; i++) if(!removed[i]) count++;
    printf("%d\n",count);
  return 0;
}
